title: Core Strategies for Effective Instructional Design Project Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding the fundamental instructional design process
context.additional_context: Instructional Design Project Collaboration Emphasizing the Development of Online Science Lectures

learning_goals: Learners can apply the nine characteristics of the CHAMELEON model to real-world cases in instructional design collaboration projects
Learners can design effective communication strategies with diverse stakeholders (instructors, designers, administrators)
Learners can diagnose collaboration issues in online science course development and propose solutions using the CHAMELEON framework
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
